com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server

Interface ThinWsServerFacade

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CheckingService, CheckingServiceCommon, CoreService, FeedbackService, TerminologyService, UserService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestServerFacade, Server27SoapWebServiceFacade

    public interface ThinWsServerFacade
extends CoreService, CheckingService, UserService, FeedbackService, TerminologyService
    A very low-level facade to wrap any web service details. This is not intended to be made visible in the API but to provide an abstraction for server interaction within the API. Implementations of this interface should hide all protocol serialization and de-serialization from the API implementation (including IAcrolinx, SOAPProperties, etc.).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server.TerminologyService
